text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (……my blood, feels like it's gone cold)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (But strangely, my face feels hot. My hands and feet feel fuzzy, and I can't properly put power in to them. Each beat of my heart reverberates through my body. So noisy.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (Too noisy, too noisy! Shut up――!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: -ber…… Dober!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Dober!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Dober, is something the matter? The call for the next participants to gather at the gates has already gone out～……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Ah…… S-sorry. Thanks……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: ……Dober, you look a little pale. If you're not feeling well――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I'M FINE……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……I'm fine so…… I'm not pushing myself. I just need to finish this mock race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: That's it, that's all I need to do……!!
Today's when Mejiro Dober is participating in a mock race. As a sub-trainer, together with Chief Trainer we were in the spectator seats, but――
choice_data_list: Um, didn't she seem a little off just now……?

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: That's true…… but right now, we should just watch over her. Look, it's almost time for Bell-chan to start.
Chief Trainer said all that, but… this unsettling feeling became a reality during the race.
(―Bang!!)

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Inside! Take the inside! Not yet, not yet, hold back, hold back! Senpai, do your best～! Big sis, go-!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Haa, haaa, kahaa……!
The running that Mejiro Dober was showing during the mock race, unlike the other day, had none of the same sharpness as before……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (Don't look! Don't look! Don't look at the spectator seats! Focus on the race! If I focus, I'll definitely……!)

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: (WHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOA-!!)
In the end, Mejiro Dober's run lacked the brilliance she had shown before and she ended the race in 8th……

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: You see, Bell-chan…… when she was young had a bitter experience, and because of that, she struggles when she's in front of a crowd.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: But even with that, it seems that on the wide, wide grounds of the Mejiro, in a training area that not many people see, she's been working as hard as she can―

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Surrounded only by maids and other Uma Musume. Because that's the environment she's been raised in, being in front of crowds… and particularly men, she still struggles with it now.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: That's why, in a real race, where the gaze of many, many people can be felt, she can't seem to show even a fraction of her true strength.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: Even though she came here because she wanted to enter races, wanted to win, it must be tough. It must have been painful this whole time…… But, you see.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: ――Even with all that, Bell-chan, still hasn't given up.
Several days after the mock race. While I was mulling over Chief Trainer's words while eating lunch――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……can I sit here?
choice_data_list: Ehh?! Y-yeah!
Ehh?! Y-yeah!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: You don't need to act so scared…… I've never even taken the time to come talk to you so even I'm aware that this seems really sudden.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……I've never even taken the time to come talk to you so I'm sorry if this seem sudden. I…… well…… I'm not good with strangers.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: But, things can't keep going on like this…… it'll just turn in to a repeat of that last mock race, even I understand that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: But, things can't keep going on like this…… it'll just turn in to a repeat of that last mock race, even I understand that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……That's why, speaking with you, is a kind of mental training! As the sub-trainer, hearing me out is part of your obligations, right?
choice_data_list: Of course, I'll hear you out
Of course, I'll hear you out

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: That's why…… even if it's a little bit at a time. Just like this, speaking to someone I'm not familiar with, might help me mentally…… can you help me with that?
choice_data_list: Of course, I'll hear you out
Of course, I'll hear you out

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……Thanks.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Thank you…… and I'm sorry.
As Chief Trainer said, Mejiro Dober is very earnest―― Seeing her like that, I suddenly wanted to ask.
choice_data_list: Why did you step in to the world of racing?
Why did you step in to the world of racing?

text_block_list.text: As Chief Trainer said, Mejiro Dober is very earnest―― Seeing her like that, I suddenly wanted to ask.
choice_data_list: Why did you step in to the world of racing?
Why did you step in to the world of racing?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: What? That's kind of sudden……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Eh, that's kind of sudden. Hmmmmm――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Nothing really…… it's pretty commonplace. In the first place, for Mejiro Uma Musume, the world of racing is something really close at hand…… but to put it simply, admiration.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Nothing really…… it's pretty commonplace. In the first place, for Mejiro Uma Musume, the world of racing is something really close at hand…… but to put it simply, admiration.

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text: Ryannn! Hey, hey, hey, Ryan! I want to enter too! I want to enter the race too! Let me!!

text_block_list.name: Young Ryan
text_block_list.text: Wawaa, Dober? What's wrong all of a sudden?

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text: I've decided! You see, me too――!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Even me, I must have been born to run and win. It's just…… that's what I've decided on, in my heart.
Mejiro Dober declared that in an indifferent manner but…… in the light of those eyes, I could sense a very strong will.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: But, I cant even run a race properly, let alone win, so it's not even worth considering. At any rate, I need to get stronger.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Trainer, she said she'd support even someone like me. That's why I…… need to win, for her as soon as possible……!
choice_data_list: If it's you, you'll definitely win
If it's you, you'll definitely win

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: What?…… Don't say that like it's easy.
choice_data_list: I really think that
I really think that

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Hm…… hearing you say that makes me happy. But, someone like me is still too weak――
choice_data_list: I really think that

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……Ah.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……Ah.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……Is that so?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: You're…… kinda weird, aren't you? I thought the only one who'd say something like that to me was Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ――Well, when you're done eating, come with me. Registration for a mock race…… is also part of being a sub-trainer, right?
choice_data_list: Yeah, I'll go with you

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ――Hey, can I ask you for a favor? After eating, I want to go register for a mock race.
choice_data_list: Yeah, I'll go with you

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Next time, for sure…… I won't show such a disgraceful appearance.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Thanks. Next time, for sure, I'll show her that I can win. Well…… and you too, okay?.
Mejiro Dober was desperately struggling. It was only slightly, but it seemed like the distance between us was shrinking――

text_block_list.text: Excuse me. Trainer, about today's training―― Trainer?……are you…… sleeping……?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……?! Trainer, Trainer?! What's wrong……?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: S-someone! Someone help, Trainer is……!!
